ARABIC: أَوْ تَقُولَ لَوْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: or lest they should say, 'If only Allah had guided me, I would have had taqwa,'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or say: "If only God had guided me I would have been a man of fear and piety;"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and lest a person should say: “If only Allah had guided me, I should have been one of the God-fearing”;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Or before the soul says, "Had God guided me, I could have been a pious man".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Or (so that no soul) may say, “If Allah had shown me the right path, I would then be among the pious!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or (lest) he should say: "If only Allah had guided me, I should indeed have been among those who have Taqwa."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or it should say: Had Allah guided me, I would certainly have been of those who guard (against evil);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: or lest it should say, 'If only God had guided me, I should have been or lest among the godfearing,'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or should say: If Allah had but guided me I should have been among the dutiful!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Or, "If only God had guided me, I would surely have joined the God-fearing."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Or, lest it should say: had Allah but guided me, I should surely have been of the God-fearing!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Or say, ‘Had Allah guided me I would have surely been among the Godwary!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or (lest) it should say: 'If only Allah had guided me, I should certainly have been among the righteous!'-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or (lest) he should say: "If only Allah had guided me, I should indeed have been among the Muttaqun (pious and righteous persons - see V. 2:2)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or, lest it should say: 'If Allah had only guided me I would have been one of the cautious'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or say, “Had God guided me; I would have been of the pious.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or [lest] it say, "If only Allah had guided me, I would have been among the righteous."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [39:57] or [before] that it should say, ‘If only God had guided me, to obedience and I had become guided, I would have been among those who have feared’, His chastisement;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or should say) and that it will not say: (if Allah had but guided me) if Allah had showed me faith (I should have been among the dutiful) I would have been among those who believe in Allah's divine Oneness!
